events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit me at all. I'd like to request a refund because I want to return the item.
The issue has been categorised as Refund since the customer mentioned returning the item and requesting money back.
An agent from the Refund support team has been assigned to handle the customer's request regarding the return and refund.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like a refund due to the jacket not fitting. Iâ€™m here to assist you with the return process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket is in its original condition with all tags attached?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is unused and still has the tags attached as it arrived.
Thank you for the details. We will email you a prepaid return shipping label shortly. Once we receive the jacket, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
Thanks for your quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the help and look forward to getting the return label.
We have sent the prepaid return label to your email. Please use it to send the jacket back. We will notify you when your refund has been processed.
Just following up to check if you have sent the jacket back and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I shipped the jacket yesterday using the return label, thank you for your help throughout this process.
Your return has been received and your refund has been processed successfully. The amount should reflect on your original payment method shortly.
We are closing this case as the refund has been completed. Please contact us again if you have any further questions.
We have sent you a short survey to gather your feedback on your refund experience. Your input helps us improve our service.
